room_title: Escape room "Sloppy's Hideout" by Key West Room Escape in Key West
room_description: Famous rum bootleggers named sloppy joe and papa have just completed another successful rum running excursion. They are making their way back to their hideout in key west from cuba and will be there in one hour. Your team of thugs must hurry if you are going to find their hidden stash of rum before they return and make you pay !! Find the clues, solve the puzzles, locate the hidden rum, & escape before they catch you and haul you out to sea to swim with the fishes !
